name: Infinite Mine Runner
description:
Infinite Mine Runner is prototype of my 2D platform endless runner game.

STORY

Your name is Nolan. You are brave adventurer who enters a dangerous gold mine to discover its richness and secrets. You have to avoid any obstacles on your way. Run and roll by foot or jump into a cart and ride as far as you can. The mine is waiting for a brave hero to face its dangers!

MOST IMPORTANT GAME FEATURES:

- DYNAMIC AND DIVERSE GAMEPLAY

- TWO PLAYABLE CHARACTERS

- RANDOMLY GENERATED OBSTACLES

- ENGAGING SIDE ACTIVITIES

- CONTROL OF YOUR PROGRESS

- REPLAYABILITY

GAMEPLAY CONROLS:

Up Arrow/W/Space - jump/double jump

Down Arrow/S - Roll

Right Arrow/Left control - Special attack

CREDITS:

Special thanks for:

Music/Soundtrack by Heatley Bros

CLOSING WORDS:

Project is still in development and should be treated more like vertical slice of the whole gameplay. You can look for a list of planned features and updates in future devlogs. 

I hope you will enjoy testing the game! Have fun! I encourage you to comment and discuss in the comment section.
